Killing Floor é um jogo de sobrevivência na qual você tem wave e a cada wave tu tens muitas balas para fazer uma chacina na mesma, porém existem waves em que você tem que escolher bem se vai gastar ou não suas balas...
O Co-op do game é ótimo, se parece com o do L4D2 um depende do outro para progredirem.

OBS: Mas o que realmente me fez comprar o jogo foi o fato de a trilha sonora do jogo contar com um Rock que caiu bem sem afetar o som ambiente e o dos monstros que te rodeiam. Pense em como é bom sair matando geral ao som de um rock.

Agora é esperar o Killing Floor 2

Killing Floor is a fantastic co-op wave based FPS game, you are given several types or "perks" to choose from each focusing on one set of weapons and attributes which you can level up under that perks requirements. There is a handful of enemy types each with their own little gimmick which as you play learn to deal with depending on the class you are playing. The game offers great support for custom mods and using them and generally all maps are whitelisted allowing you to level up even when playing on unofficial stages. This game is highly recommended if you have friends since it can be a blast working together as a team and completing challanges you are willing to face. Even if you don't have many people to play with the community is large and elaborate and boasts over thousands of free working servers for you and other random people to join whenever you feel like. One of the nicer things about this game is the constant support and updates from the team at Tripwire releasing new content and holiday events switching up the look and adding more new things to do to keep you playing. With all that said this is easilly my favorite Steam multiplayer game so I say it's 100% worth a buy. I hope support for this game continues even with the release of Killing Floor 2 down the road.

A great game to play by yourself. The people on the game are usually nice, however you do get the occasional [insert vulgar word here] who tries to ruin the fun. That shouldn't dissuade you from buying this game, you can play solo, or with your friends: yes, you should bug them to buy this game too! Either way you play it I'm sure you'll enjoy it - if not, you can beat me up with your keyboards.
You will find hours of fun in this game if you are a fan of killing Zed's while seeing the satisfying destruction of its head, or things of the sort. 
Best played with friends, but even the loneliest of gamers can play it - that's what I did when I first bought it. 

Bring a good zombie killing playlist, or use the music on the game, and be ready to rack up and body count: it's not called Killing Floor for nothing.

Nie zależnie od tego, czy dołączasz do serwera i grasz z obcymi, czy masz u boku samych znajomych, KF gwarantuje super rozgrywkę.

Gra jest bardzo klimatyczna. To zasługa oprawy graficznej (tu nie mogę się zgodzić z opiniami o kiepskiej grafice, bo jest ona świetna), jak i ścieżki dźwiękowej. W powietrzu aż czuć ludzkie napięcie i przerażenie, a jest czego się bać.
Zedy, czyli nasze mutanty, to nie jakieś tam popierdułki na jednego hita. Nawet pozbawione głowy potrafią Cię wypatroszyć, jeśli nie jesteś dostatecznie ostrożny ;) Twórcy się postarali i SI jest na naprawdę wysokim poziomie. 
Zedy reagują na dźwięki i obrazy. Potrafią atakować z zaskoczenia i współpracować ze sobą. Oczywiście mamy tu też kilku indywidualistów, którzy prują do przodu (czyt. do Ciebie), nie zważając po drodze na nic i nikogo. Bez porządnej spluwy nawet do nich nie mierz, bo skończysz rozmazany na najbliższej ścianie.
Jeśli jesteśmy wystarczająco szybcy, czasem możemy uciec naszym prześladowcom lub po prostu oddalić się od nich na "bezpieczną" odległość. Tylko pamiętajmy o najważniejszym: nie ruszasz się - umierasz!  Na szczęście mapy są tak skonstruowane, że na każdej odnajdziemy masę korytarzy, pomieszczeń i przejść, którymi możemy poruszać się do woli. Oczywiście, jeśli nie zagnieździły się w nich już nasze Zedy ;)

+ grafika

+ SI Zedów
+ teamplay
+ możliwość rozegrania każdej mapy na wiele sposobów
+ różnorodność talentów i broni
+ kilka poziomów trudności

It's very rare that in a multiplayer game, even one where you almost exclusively fight AI, you feel a relation to your team mates. It may be because I main medic, but upon entering a lobby I generally feel a sense of camaraderie with the rest of my squad. I care for their wellbeing, and I find that they generally care for mine. Though your matches are short, your experiences will be fantastic.

Killing Floor. How the hell could I sum this game up in a paragraph without going off on how fucking retarded it is. 

First off, the gameplay is fucking terrible. imagine running around in a field with a handgun shooting at monsters for 2 hours. Oh wait, you already do that in this piece of trash game. for example, why on earth would I waste a few thousand dollars on a Zombie Eradication Device when it's completely useless to do so when I'm not on the boss yet. I waste all the ammo for it, thinking it's a beautiful gun, when all of a sudden I find out that I have to pay 3000 to refill it's ammo stock. 

On to the graphics. For god sakes. Why on earth did the head designer of this game feel the need to crap a bunch of tesselated gibs onto a wireframe body and let them fly off when a monster gets shot in the head. for FUCK SAKES, YOU PIECE OF FUCKING SHIT TRIPWIRE. WHY DO YOU INSIST ON MAKING US PLAY THESE TRASH GAMES. I THOUGHT YOU'D FORSAKEN US AFTER RED ORCHESTRA, AND THEN YOU GO AND PRODUCE THIS HELL SPAWN THAT I CAN'T GET OUT OF MY HEAD?

What a great game, I have tons of hours into this, great with a small group of friends, especially when each specializes in a different perk/class. Would be nice though if this game didn't GLITCH CONSTANTLY and not let me play. Tons of weird errors causing the game to crash, or not start at all... Google search turns up a whole bunch of nothing, and Tripwire Interactive seems more interested in new DLC than to fix the game.

I could go in depth for this review but I won't to save a bit of time. First let me say that Killing Floor is a well made game and is fun to play. With the focus being on multiplayer co-op this first-person shooter will send wave after wave of specimens(zombies basically) at you until the final round where you will face off against a boss(the only one), the patriarch. Before you spawn in the round you must choose one of the seven classes avaliable to you. If you enter the game in the middle of a wave you must wait until the end of the round, which is understandable. People wouldn't want to join in the middle of at least one hundred specimens with only a pistol to aid you. Between each wave there will be a small amount of time to rest and buy new guns with money earned by killing zeds and for surviving a round, the prices of each gun will vary from class to class. As far as graphics go the game holds up well considering it's age, although there will be a few occasions where you will see a zed poke it's head or arm through a solid door or wall. Sound quality is good however there is a small amount of music played during the waves. At the moment of typing this I cannot think of a few flaws for the game. If I think of any I will revise the review. 

In total would I recommend this game? Yes I would.

Killing Floor ist nicht nur irgendein Zombie shooter es ist meienr meinung nach der Beste den es gibt.
Es überbietet in sachen Gameplay einfach alle anderen spiele gut story und inszenierung hat man schonmal besser gesehen z.B. l4d.
Allerdings macht das spiel einen riesen Spaß und bietet durch das hochleveln der Perks meiner meinung nach wehsentlich mehr Langzeitmotivation als l4d (einfach mal so zum vergleich).
Grafisch ist das Spiel dank unreal 2 engine (wenn ich mich nicht schwer irre) zwar keine Meisterleistung sieht aber ganz nett aus und läuft auch auf schwächeren Pcs.
Nur die DLCs sind etwas störend wobei niemand gezwungen ist diese zu kaufen es gibt auch Waffen DLCs allerdings sind diese dann nur optisch verändert oder bieten eine Zwischenstufe es gibt also nicht die Möglichkeit sich einen unfairen Vorteil durch DLC's zu beschaffen.
Der Schwierigkeitsgrad ist ziemlich gut zwar kann man auf normal schon alles umholzen wenn man dann aber nicht aufpasst und eingekreist wird wars das dann schnell mit einem.
Der Endboss der einzige Boss im spiel der sogenannte "Patriarch" ist ein wenig stark und man muss aufpassen da er einen sonst mit 2-3 treffern umhaut er ist meienr Meinung nach etwas stark aber besiegbar.
Für die die sich an der Zensierung stören (wie ich) es gibt eine einfache Methode dafür das man im Spiel genau so viel blut und leichenteile umher fliegen hat wie alle anderen Länder auch dafür muss man nur etwas in einer Textdatei ändern und das Spiel auf englisch stellen was auch gut ist da die Deutsche synchro schon fast an Körper verletzung grenzt...
ира очень веселая в ней можно убить время

Le jeu est sympa aux premiers abord, une fois qu'on à compris que c'est toujours pareil ça deviens lassant et on le désinstalle assez vite. 
C'est sûr les armes sont sympa, buter du zombie c'est sympa, mais pitié, les voix Française -_-
Aucun scénario à part tuer tout les zombies vague par vagues jusqu'à tous mourir donc au final très peu d'intérêt sur le long terme. Un PvE sans enjeu. 
Autant acheter un L4D, c'est pareil, en plus beau et en scénarisé. Bref je comprend pas trop pourquoi tout le monde acclame ce jeu mais après chacun ses goûts.

This game is oneof the most i play, the amount of hours iv'e spent on this game gives me no regret as i know each minute was well worth it. The game in singleplayer is fun but until you have 5 other people with you all fighting it out just to kill that last clot is just the greatest, But with every good there is also bad. The game has almost no storyline and although maps are downloadable through the steam workshop there are little ones that stick out. if you plan on buying this game make sure you buy the complete edition with all of the DLC's as without them the guns become boring and buying the DLC seperately can be extremely expensive. (over $100 last time i checked!!) but i recommend this game and give it a 9/10
